data.text: @mrRteaching @LorraineHughe20 @ChilternLT @SpringfieldBeds @Neil_Mills1 @Headtea78463084 @julian_axford @steagueCLT @unleashing_me @MVM_school @DaubeneyAcademy @KarenBateman07 @JamesEValentine Can’t eat a pack of tissues…

@LorraineHughe20 @ChilternLT @SpringfieldBeds @Neil_Mills1 @Headtea78463084 @julian_axford @VickiCollin @steagueCLT @unleashing_me @MVM_school @DaubeneyAcademy @KarenBateman07 @JamesEValentine Complete pleasure - can’t wait to go back more. I may need a new blue jacket as I think @VickiCollin has commandeered mine - although she was disappointed that my normal snack stash wasn’t in the pockets!

@StewCow2 @ChilternLT @SpringfieldBeds @Neil_Mills1 @Headtea78463084 @julian_axford @VickiCollin @steagueCLT @unleashing_me @LorraineHughe20 @MVM_school @DaubeneyAcademy @KarenBateman07 @JamesEValentine I will be back soon to enjoy more

@mrRteaching @ChilternLT @SpringfieldBeds @Neil_Mills1 @Headtea78463084 @julian_axford @VickiCollin @steagueCLT @unleashing_me @LorraineHughe20 @MVM_school @DaubeneyAcademy @KarenBateman07 @JamesEValentine Thanking you all for your support. Delighted you have enjoyed the experience.

@ChilternLT @SpringfieldBeds @Neil_Mills1 @Headtea78463084 @julian_axford @VickiCollin @mrRteaching @steagueCLT @unleashing_me @LorraineHughe20 @MVM_school @DaubeneyAcademy @KarenBateman07 And commiserations @SpringfieldBeds staff, sorry about the tough time you've been having...

@ChilternLT @SpringfieldBeds @Neil_Mills1 @Headtea78463084 @julian_axford @VickiCollin @steagueCLT @unleashing_me @LorraineHughe20 @MVM_school @DaubeneyAcademy @KarenBateman07 @JamesEValentine The Year 5 and 6 were a delight to see in class and on the playground - superb ambassadors for the school. Well done all the staff for their hard work. I know @VickiCollin loved her time helping in English and I loved seeing phonics and obviously Maths!

@ChilternLT @SpringfieldBeds @Neil_Mills1 @Headtea78463084 @julian_axford @VickiCollin @mrRteaching @steagueCLT @unleashing_me @LorraineHughe20 @MVM_school @DaubeneyAcademy @KarenBateman07 @JamesEValentine The staff & children @SpringfieldBeds are a delight. I came second in the Year 6 keepy uppy competition at lunch time & learnt lots off the Year 3s and Year 5s! Such commitment from staff today.
